tool_description:
Unofficial API for Train Running Status of Indian Railways.
Live Train Running Status is a crucial keyword in the world of railway transportation, and Qrail is one of the leading providers of this service. With Live Train Running Status, passengers can get real-time updates on the current location and running status of their train, including expected arrival and departure times. Qrail's Live Train Running Status service is highly reliable and accurate, providing passengers with peace of mind ...
title: Train Running Status Indian Railways

api_list.name: Running Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://train-running-status-indian-railways.p.rapidapi.com/trainman/{train_no}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "train-running-status-indian-railways.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
